fireOfficer.title: Fire Officer
fireOfficer.description: Fire Officers can carry more and run faster for longer periods of time.

policeOfficer.title: Police Officer
policeOfficer.description: Police Officers are very effective with firearms, as such this profession is great if you want to face the hordes of the undead Guns Blazin'.

athletic.title: Athletic
athletic.description: Can run faster and longer without tiring.

eagleEyed.title: Eagle Eyed
eagleEyed.description: Has a faster visibility fade and a higher visibility arc.

fastHealer.title: Fast Healer
fastHealer.description: Recovers faster from injury and illness.

fastReader.title: Fast Reader
fastReader.description: Takes less time to read books.

inconspicuous.title: Inconspicuous
inconspicuous.description: Less likely to be spotted by zombies.

ironGut.title: Iron Gut
ironGut.description: Less chance to have food illness.

lowThirst.title: Low Thirst
lowThirst.description: Needs to drink water less regularly.

lucky.title: Lucky
lucky.description: Sometimes things just go your way.

outdoorsman.title: Outdoorsman
outdoorsman.description: Not affected by harsh weather conditions.

resilient.title: Resilient
resilient.description: Less prone to disease. Slower rate of zombification.

stout.title: Stout
stout.description: Extra knockback from melee weapons and increased carry weight.

strong.title: Strong
strong.description: Extra knockback from melee weapons and increased carry weight.

thickSkinned.title: Thick Skinned
thickSkinned.description: Less chance of scratches or bites breaking the skin.

conspicuous.title: Conspicuous
conspicuous.description: More likely to be spotted by zombies.

deaf.title: Deaf
deaf.description: Smaller perception radius and hearing range

emaciated.title: Emaciated
emaciated.description: Low strength, low endurance and prone to injury

feeble.title: Feeble
feeble.description: Less knockback from melee weapons. Decreased carrying weight.

hardOfHearing.title: Hard of Hearing
hardOfHearing.description: Smaller perception radius. Smaller hearing range.

fearOfBlood.title: Fear of Blood
fearOfBlood.description: Panic when performing first aid on self, cannot perform first aid on others, gets stressed when bloody

obese.title: Obese
obese.description: Reduced running speed, very low endurance and prone to injury.

overweight.title: Overweight
overweight.description: Reduced running speed, low endurance and prone to injury.

proneToIllness.title: Prone to Illness
proneToIllness.description: More prone to disease. Faster rate of zombification.

restlessSleeper.title: Restless Sleeper
restlessSleeper.description: Slow loss of tiredness while sleeping

shortSighted.title: Short Sighted
shortSighted.description: Small view distance. Slower visibility fade.

smoker.title: Smoker
smoker.description: Stress and unhappiness decrease after smoking tobacco. Unhappiness rises when tobacco is not smoked.

slowHealer.title: Slow Healer
slowHealer.description: Recovers slowly from injuries and illness

thinSkinned.title: Thin-skinned
thinSkinned.description: Increased chance of scratches, lacerations, or bites breaking the skin.

underweight.title: Underweight
underweight.description: Low strength, low endurance and prone to injury.

unfit.title: Unfit
unfit.description: Very low endurance, very low endurance regeneration.

unlucky.title: Unlucky
unlucky.description: What could go wrong for you, often does.

veryUnderweight.title: Very Underweight
veryUnderweight.description: Very low strength, very low endurance and prone to injury.

weak.title: Weak
weak.description: Less knockback from melee weapons. Decreased carrying weight.

weakStomach.title: Weak Stomach
weakStomach.description: Higher chance to have food illness.

amateurMechanic.title: Amateur Mechanic
amateurMechanic.description: +3 Mechanics, can repair all vehicle types without having to read any recipe magazines.

axeMan.title: Axe Man
axeMan.description: Swing axes 25% faster (combat and tree cutting).

burglar.title: Burglar
burglar.description: Can hotwire vehicles and has less chance of breaking the lock of a window when forced open.

cook.title: Cook
cook.description: Affects search mode and knows all the cooking recipes without having to read any recipe magazines.

desensitized.title: Desensitized
desensitized.description: 0% panic from all sources except night terrors.

nightOwl.title: Night Owl
nightOwl.description: Recovers from tiredness quicker while sleeping, but will remain asleep even when your character reaches 0 tiredness, which requires an alarm to take advantage of the trait.

nutritionist.title: Nutritionist
nutritionist.description: Allows the player to see the nutritional values of any food, even those that aren't packaged. Affects search mode.

trait.description.positive.athletic: Can run faster and longer without tiring
trait.description.occupation.amateur-mec: Familiar with the maintenance and repair of all vehicle models on the roads of Kentucky
trait.description.hobby.amateur-mechanic: Has a detailed knowledge of common and heavy vehicle models and their repairs.
trait.description.hobby-occupation.nutri: Can see the nutritional values of any food.
